summary: Completed testing of Joboost 4 new features: spontaneous applications, personalized offers, 3-tier credit system, and progress timeline. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend has authentication persistence issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Session not persisting properly after login, causing redirects to login page

integration_issues.issue: Credit counters, sidebar navigation, progress chart, and offers sections not visible due to auth issues

passed_tests: User schema has 3 separate credit fields (ai_cv_credits, ai_letter_credits, spontaneous_credits)
Pricing page shows 3 plans (Gratuit, Pro, Ultra)
Pricing page shows credit-related features for all plans
Login form accepts credentials and attempts authentication
Backend APIs return proper data structures
Mock data fallback working for external APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication session persistence. The login works but sessions are not maintained, causing protected routes to redirect to login. This prevents testing of dashboard features like credit counters, sidebar navigation, progress chart, and personalized offers sections.
